attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Very recently it has become evident that the goverment and the MPs of all parties cannot be trusted to handle thier own expenses let alone the purse strings of her majestys government. 

Its about time that the people were allowed to decide whether Gordon Brown is fit to run the country and whether thier own MPs are fit to represent them at Westminister.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
